ygData.subject: Re: Juggling instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: My whole third page of Hot bottons is dedicated to inventory, the middle two hot buttons are my #1 and #2 melee spots(in the middle because i can easily switch
ygData.messageBody:
My whole third page of Hot bottons is dedicated to inventory, the middle two
hot buttons are my #1 and #2 melee spots(in the middle because i can easily
switch from above or below). I keep instruments in the top two and one in
the bottom, leaving one open (for the switch cause I dual wield). I can
switch from the main screen and I never drop. It has saved my life on
numerous occasions to load the drum and blaze trails ( Hint load the drum
before you run, that will reduce the time they get at your back).
-----Original Message-----
From: Warren Wang <wwang@...>
To: EQ Bards <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, July 03, 1999 10:59 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Juggling instruments


>From: Warren Wang <wwang@...>
>
>So how does everyone else manage to juggling instruments/weapons and
>not drop something on the ground? I just lost a fine steel spear,
>which I spent most of my bank account on (money isn't exactly prolific
>at level 8). Tried to shout and see if someone would return it, but
>alas to no avail. Yes I'm using the inventory-as-hotkey method. I
>have no problem juggling 2-3 songs, but trying to switch instruments
>is a serious PITA with the risk of dropping something.
>
>Warren, aka Erol of Cazic-Thule
>
